author: jford
msg: Added support for user attributes

author: jford
msg: Check for null node

author: weaver
msg: Make sure that error reporting does not cause IllegalStateExceptions.

author: weaver
msg: Changed to using getPropertyValue to avoid possible ArrayIndexOutOfBounds exceptions.  The "+ 0" force Velocity to set the $row and $col
variables as int's.

author: taylor
msg: addied support to layout portlets for Help mode
next step will be secure mode
